summary: The diff implements the requested Seller Dashboard redesign with a dashboard-only dark top bar, onboarding/checklist-style cards wired to existing actions, and preserves product management access. No clear evidence of 'Shopify' text remains in the new dashboard components. The diff also includes unrelated global styling and URL-parameter utility changes that were not explicitly requested for this dashboard-only redesign.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified URL parameter + sessionStorage utilities unrelated to the Seller Dashboard redesign scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on redesigning SellerDashboardPage UI without backend changes; URL param parsing/session persistence is not mentioned as part of the dashboard redesign requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/token changes in index.css beyond the Seller Dashboard page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements target redesigning SellerDashboardPage to match screenshots; updating global color tokens/utilities may affect the rest of the app and was not explicitly requested as part of REQ-26..29.
